config.title: Search Launcher
config.description: Open a search bar to quickly jump into any mod registered with GMCM.
config.toggle.description: Press this to open the GMCM search overlay.
config.openAtTitle.description: Allow the search overlay to be opened before loading a save.
menu.title: GMCM Quick Search
menu.subtitle: Click a result to open its config in GMCM.
menu.failed: Could not open GMCM for {0} (is it registered?)
menu.gmcmMissing: Generic Mod Config Menu is not installed.
menu.registryMissing: Couldn't read GMCM's registered mod list; showing only non-content mods.
